Detailed Description

myConsole: The IO wrapper. It currently uses MGRX 1.0 library with Xlib

void myConsole::DrawImage ( int  ltx,
int  lty,
int  rbx,
int  rby,
int  i_type,
const char *  addr 
)

Draws the image

Parameters:
ltx Left top corner x coordinate
lty Left top corner y coordinate
rbx Right bottom x coordinate
rby Right bottom y coordinate
i_type The type of image (I_JPG, I_PNM, I_PNM_BUFFER)
addr The address of image in case of jpg and pnm and the pointer to char array which stores the pnm image in case of pnm_buffer
See also:
I_JPG

I_PNM

I_PNM_BUFFER

Member Data Documentation

GrTextOption myConsole::gto

A GrTextOption object which represents a structure containing options used to print the text like forecolor and backcolor etc.

Note:
See the MGRX documentation for details
